main.name: Stephanie Wang
main.description: currently study at University of Alberta, Electrical and Computer Engineering Department (Software Eng & Intelligent Sys)
main.bio: I am an musician at heart, with an adventurous spirit and a passion for coding. I always love to learn new things in software engineering as well as taking online courses on the topic I'm interested in. I was focused and interested in Machine Learning/Deep Learning in Computer Vision before, now I'm focused on web development and frontend development more.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: • M.Eng. in ECE (Software Engineering & Intelligent Systems)
education.description: I've taken multiple Software Engineering and Machine learning courses at school as well as taken online web development courses on Udemy on my own time.

Although I was under Electrical Engineering program, I was mainly focused on Machine Learning and Deep Learning in computer vision during my third and fourth year. I've also received more than 10 awards in academic excellence and fundings during these four years.

work.title: part-time job
work.description: Examined and updated the product software. Conducted market survey to determine an appropriate price for product.

publication.title: [1] Steffi Agino Priyanka, Yuan-Kai Wang, Chieh Wang, "Effective Image Denoising Using Symmetric Convolution-Deconvolution Architecture," Computer Vision, Graphics, and Image Processing, Tainan, Taiwan, 2018.

projects.title: Implementation and Anlysis of Deep Learning in Human Detection

mainprojects.title: Music Search Engine (On going project)
mainprojects.skills: Python, ReactJs, Redux, Neo4j, Flask API
mainprojects.description: This is a music search engine for searching and listening to related music. Me and my project partner scrap all of the music data from MusicBrainz and IMSLP, use Neo4j graph database to manage the data, and use Flask API to serve as backend, React to serve as frontend.

mainprojects.title: Socket Board Game - Hanabi
mainprojects.description: Applied Socket API to program a self-designed 4-player online game. The rules of this board game is following the original Hanabi card game. Players connected to the server using IP address through Socket API. Server listens on the socket and waits for client (players) requests (sny changes with the cards).

mainprojects.title: Implementation and Anlysis of Deep Learning in Human Detection (Undergraduate research)
mainprojects.description: Applied traditional Machine Learning algorithm (HOG-SVM, Haar Cascade) and Deep Learning algorithm (Faster-RCNN) in human detection. Analized and compared the results between traditional Machine Learning algorithm and Deep Learning algorithm.

mainprojects.title: Online Resume
mainprojects.description: Used ReactJS template designed by Tim Baker on GitHub, and futher developed as my personal website.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
